```diff
+     font-weight: bold;

+ .status-indicator.orange { color: orange; }
```

```diff
+ // Function to populate the HTML elements with data
+ function populatePage(data) {
+     // Header Stats
+     document.getElementById('total-calls').innerText = data.history.todayStats.processed;
+     document.getElementById('generated-summaries').innerText = data.history.todayStats.processed; // Assuming generated = processed for this demo
+     document.getElementById('avg-process-time').innerText = data.history.todayStats.avgTime;
+     document.getElementById('summary-accuracy').innerText = data.history.todayStats.qualityScore; // Using quality score as proxy for accuracy in header
+     document.getElementById('time-saved').innerText = "52.1"; // Placeholder, calculate if needed
+     
+     document.getElementById('stt-status').innerText = "🟢 正常"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('nlp-status').innerText = "🟢 正常"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('summary-status').innerText = "🟢 正常"; // Static for demo
+     document.getElementById('integration-status').innerText = "🟢 正常"; // Static for demo
+ 
+     // Call Info
+     document.getElementById('call-id').innerText = data.id;
+     document.getElementById('caller-number').innerText = data.callerNumber;
+     document.getElementById('agent-id').innerText = data.agentId;
+     document.getElementById('agent-name').innerText = data.agentName;
+     document.getElementById('start-time').innerText = data.startTime;
+     document.getElementById('end-time').innerText = data.endTime;
+     document.getElementById('call-duration').innerText = data.duration;
+     document.getElementById('call-type').innerText = data.type;
+     // Caller Info - static for demo
+     document.getElementById('caller-name').innerText = "李女士";
+     document.getElementById('caller-identity').innerText = "已验证 ✓";
+     document.getElementById('caller-level').innerText = "VIP";
+     document.getElementById('caller-history').innerText = "3";
+     document.getElementById('caller-common-issues').innerText = "房产相关";
+     // Process Status
+     document.getElementById('process-status').innerText = "✅ 已完成"; // Assuming demo shows completed process
+     document.getElementById('process-progress-text').innerText = "100";
+     document.getElementById('process-progress-fill').style.width = "100%";
+     document.getElementById('estimated-completion').innerText = "已完成";
+ 
+     // Transcript
+     document.getElementById('transcript-confidence').innerText = `置信度: ${data.transcriptConfidence}`;
+     const transcriptContentDiv = document.getElementById('transcript-content');
+     transcriptContentDiv.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing content
+     data.transcript.forEach(line => {
+         const p = document.createElement('p');
+         p.innerText = `[${line.time}] ${line.speaker}: ${line.text}`;
+         transcriptContentDiv.appendChild(p);
+     });
+      // Add placeholder for hidden content
+     const moreContent = document.createElement('p');
+     moreContent.innerText = "[显示更多转录内容...] [折叠]";
+     transcriptContentDiv.appendChild(moreContent);
+ 
+     document.getElementById('transcript-word-count').innerText = data.transcriptWordCount;
+     document.getElementById('transcript-avg-confidence').innerText = data.transcriptAvgConfidence;
+     document.getElementById('transcript-low-confidence').innerText = data.transcriptLowConfidence;
+     document.getElementById('transcript-manual-check').innerText = data.transcriptManualCheck;
+ 
+     // Analysis
+     document.getElementById('analysis-topic-confidence').innerText = `置信度: ${data.analysis.topicConfidence}`;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-main-topic').innerText = data.analysis.mainTopic;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-sub-topic').innerText = data.analysis.subTopic;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-tags').innerText = data.analysis.tags;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-emotion').innerText = data.analysis.emotion;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-attitude').innerText = data.analysis.attitude;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-satisfaction').innerText = data.analysis.satisfaction;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-risk').innerText = data.analysis.risk;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-time').innerText = data.analysis.timeInfo;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-location').innerText = data.analysis.locationInfo;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-parties').innerText = data.analysis.parties;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-core-issue').innerText = data.analysis.coreIssue;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-customer-demand').innerText = data.analysis.customerDemand;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-urgency').innerText = data.analysis.urgency;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-suggested-dept').innerText = data.analysis.suggestedDept;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-handling-method').innerText = data.analysis.handlingMethod;
+     document.getElementById('analysis-follow-up').innerText = data.analysis.followUp;
+ 
+     // Summary Generation
+     document.getElementById('summary-template').innerText = data.summary.template;
+     document.getElementById('summary-quality').innerText = data.summary.quality;
+     document.getElementById('summary-time').innerText = data.summary.time;
+     
+     document.getElementById('summary-time-range').innerText = data.summary.timeRange;
+     document.getElementById('summary-duration').innerText = data.summary.duration;
+     document.getElementById('summary-caller').innerText = data.summary.caller;
+     document.getElementById('summary-agent').innerText = data.summary.agent;
+     document.getElementById('summary-problem-description').innerText = data.summary.problemDescription;
+     document.getElementById('summary-project-name').innerText = data.summary.projectName;
+     document.getElementById('summary-developer').innerText = data.summary.developer;
+     document.getElementById('summary-purchase-time').innerText = data.summary.purchaseTime;
+     document.getElementById('summary-promised-time').innerText = data.summary.promisedTime;
+     document.getElementById('summary-actual-situation').innerText = data.summary.actualSituation;
+     
+     const processStepsOl = document.querySelector('.summary-content ol');
+     processStepsOl.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing steps
+     data.summary.processSteps.forEach(step => {
+         const li = document.createElement('li');
+         li.innerText = step;
+         processStepsOl.appendChild(li);
+     });
+ 
+     document.getElementById('summary-solution-instant').innerText = data.summary.solutionInstant;
+     document.getElementById('summary-solution-follow-up').innerText = data.summary.solutionFollowUp;
+     document.getElementById('summary-solution-rights').innerText = data.summary.solutionRights;
+     document.getElementById('summary-solution-time-promise').innerText = data.summary.solutionTimePromise;

+     document.getElementById('summary-satisfaction').innerText = data.summary.satisfaction;

+     document.getElementById('summary-risk-level').innerText = data.summary.riskLevel;
+

+     document.getElementById('crm-update').innerText = data.integration.crmUpdate;
+     document.getElementById('crm-save').innerText = data.integration.crmSave;

+     document.getElementById('quality-completeness').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.completeness;
+     document.getElementById('quality-accuracy').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.accuracy;
+     document.getElementById('quality-conciseness').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.conciseness;
+     document.getElementById('quality-structure').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.structure;
+     document.getElementById('quality-overall').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.overall;
+     
+     const checkItemsUl = document.querySelector('.quality-assessment ul:nth-of-type(2)'); // Select the second ul
+     checkItemsUl.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing items
+     data.qualityAssessment.checkItems.forEach(item => {
+         const li = document.createElement('li');
+         li.innerHTML = `<span class="status-indicator">${item.status}</span> ${item.text}`;
+         checkItemsUl.appendChild(li);
+     });
+ 
+     const suggestionsUl = document.querySelector('.quality-assessment ul:nth-of-type(3)'); // Select the third ul
+     suggestionsUl.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing suggestions
+     data.qualityAssessment.improvementSuggestions.forEach(suggestion => {
+         const li = document.createElement('li');
+         li.innerText = suggestion;
+         suggestionsUl.appendChild(li);
+     });
+ 
+     document.getElementById('manual-review-status').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.manualReviewStatus;
+     document.getElementById('manual-review-assignee').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.manualReviewAssignee;
+     document.getElementById('manual-review-time').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.manualReviewTime;
+     document.getElementById('manual-review-standard').innerText = data.qualityAssessment.manualReviewStandard;
+ 
+     // History
+     const recentRecordsUl = document.querySelector('.history ul:nth-of-type(1)'); // Select the first ul
+     recentRecordsUl.innerHTML = ''; // Clear existing records
+     data.history.recentRecords.forEach(record => {
+         const li = document.createElement('li');
+         li.innerHTML = `${record.id} | ${record.time} | ${record.type} | <span class="status-indicator">${record.status}</span>`;
+         recentRecordsUl.appendChild(li);
+     });
+      const moreHistory = document.createElement('li');
+      moreHistory.innerText = "[查看更多历史记录]";
+      recentRecordsUl.appendChild(moreHistory);
+ 
+     document.getElementById('today-calls-processed').innerText = data.history.todayStats.processed;
+     document.getElementById('today-calls-total').innerText = data.history.todayStats.total;
+     document.getElementById('today-calls-percentage').innerText = data.history.todayStats.percentage;
+     document.getElementById('today-avg-time').innerText = data.history.todayStats.avgTime;
+     document.getElementById('today-time-delta').innerText = data.history.todayStats.timeDelta;
+     document.getElementById('today-quality-score').innerText = data.history.todayStats.qualityScore;
+     document.getElementById('today-quality-level').innerText = data.history.todayStats.qualityLevel;
+     document.getElementById('today-manual-intervention').innerText = data.history.todayStats.manualIntervention;
+     document.getElementById('today-manual-intervention-percentage').innerText = data.history.todayStats.manualInterventionPercentage;
+     document.getElementById('today-customer-satisfaction').innerText = data.history.todayStats.customerSatisfaction;
+     document.getElementById('today-customer-satisfaction-level').innerText = data.history.todayStats.customerSatisfactionLevel;
+     
+     document.getElementById('trend-efficiency').innerText = data.history.trendEfficiency;
+     document.getElementById('trend-quality').innerText = data.history.trendQuality;
+     document.getElementById('trend-hot-issues').innerText = data.history.trendHotIssues;
+     document.getElementById('trend-optimization').innerText = data.history.trendOptimization;
+     
+     document.getElementById('performance-summary-success').innerText = data.history.performanceSummarySuccess;
+     document.getElementById('performance-integration-success').innerText = data.history.performanceIntegrationSuccess;
+     document.getElementById('performance-avg-response').innerText = data.history.performanceAvgResponse;
+     document.getElementById('performance-storage').innerText = data.history.performanceStorage;
+ 
+ }
+ 
+ // Load data and populate page on DOM content loaded
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
+     // Assuming we are using the first sample for the demo
+     const demoData = callSamples[0];
+     populatePage(demoData);
+ });
+ 
```

---



---

好的，我已经完成了在 `CJ_C` 目录下创建 demo 页面的工作。

我创建了以下文件：
1.  `CJ_C/index.html`: 包含了页面的基本结构和内容布局。
2.  `CJ_C/style.css`: 为页面添加了样式，使其看起来更符合设计。
3.  `CJ_C/script.js`: 包含了模拟数据以及将数据填充到 HTML 页面中的 JavaScript 代码。

现在，您可以在浏览器中打开 `CJ_C/index.html` 文件来查看生成的 demo 页面。页面内容会使用设计计划中提供的模拟数据进行填充。
